website_summaries.verdict: Players must guess what the other is saying with a giggle-inducing catch.
pros: An affordable game that's perfect for bringing to family gatherings
There are various editions of the game and expansions to ensure it doesn't get repetitive
The deck of cards is sturdy, too
There's enough mouth pieces for everyone to get in on the fun
cons: Mouth pieces can be unsanitary when worn multiple times

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game after finding out there will be a few showers coming for our BBQ. I wanted to have something handy that would take our minds off the rainy weather. We played the game with 12 people (6 people each team). It was an instant hit. Highly recommend the game! I would suggest buying small dental retractors if you are planning on having kids play the game. The retractors that come with the game are pretty big; I am not sure what size they are but grown men had a difficult time putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Bonmoza12308

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Tip
customer_reviews.text: Brought it over for Christmas to use with my 70+ year old relatives. No one wanted anything to do with it till I put in the mouthpiece, then everyone was laughing so hard we could hardly make it through a round. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Tip: Make sure you brush your teeth and have a spit towel handy. Also look close at the picture on the back of the box to make sure you don't try to insert the mouthpiece backwards.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: I know it is loads of fun but I guess I will find out after their ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play with my niece and nephew (7 and 10 yrs old) but the mouthpieces do not fit in their mouths. I'm sure I should have taken that into consideration when purchasing, but now I have to buy special mouthpieces and I haven't done so yet....so the game has been collecting dust since Christmas. I know it is loads of fun but I guess I will find out after their mouths grow a little more. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Mag Mag

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun playing this at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun playing this at Christmas. Laughed so hard I had a headache and a side ache. Not as funny the second day, but still funny. We got better at understanding what the other person said. The mouth piece hurt my mouth. It didn't hurt other players, but it made them drool a lot. Keep tissue handy for tears from laughter as well as drool.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: One of the funniest games ever!
customer_reviews.text: This game is freaking hilarious!! I was worried the mouth pieces would be really uncomfortable, but they actually weren’t. Be prepared for drooling, though, because I didn’t even think about that! You can sterilize the mouth pieces after each use or just purchase replacements, if you’re a germaphobe. I recommend this game 10000000%!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious Game, Wish There Were More Cards
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband bought this game after watching the hilarious Youtube videos. When we looked it up on Amazon we were pleasantly surprised by the price, and bought it right away. it arrived quickly (as always with Amazon) and we tested it out with a couple of friends. We found the mouth pieces very easy to put in, and the directions were simple. We had a great night full of lots of laughs. My only complaint is that by the second time we played the game with my husband's family, we already had some of the answers memorized. I wish it came with more cards. Other than that, it's a complete blast!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gula

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: This game was hilarious. You completely feel like an idiot in the beginning but slowly get the hang of it. Lots of cards, came with ten mouth pieces. Laughed almost the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: It is a very fun game.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very fun game..... BUT the package arrived, and I took to a girls weekend.....when we went to open it.......none of the parts and pieces were sealed....Since these go in your mouth.....very un-sanitary.....I would recommend you do not re sale items that have been in others peoples mouths....
customer_reviews.author: sandree

customer_reviews.title: Laughs for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for get togethers! We laughed, we cried, we almost died. Haha. Although, the included mouth pieces are too big for some mouths. Thankfully we had a less impressive game of “Watch Ya Mouth” that had smaller sizes. This game is imensely better than the “knock off version” and we’ve already ordered the other card sets to expand our fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Hagg

customer_reviews.title: This is the best game ever
customer_reviews.text: I played this game on Friday night. This is the best game ever. My daughter's were laughing so hard. I had to order one for us. Very fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: okay game
customer_reviews.text: This game is okay - if playing with younger kids you may want to go through the deck to make sure the kids know all the words, also warning on mouth things - they will hurt your mouth after awhile and my son had a rash on his chin the next day from the mouth thing. Yes wash these before you play never know what was used on them and you will want to wash after because - eww lol
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Mouth pieces are huge but the game is fun. They need to add different size mouth pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Mouth pieces are huge but the game is fun. They need to add different size mouth pieces instead if one size
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: A must habe for family or friends reunions!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this game. Hours of fun!!! We laugh a lot while playing it (kids and adults). Some phrases doesn’t even make sense which adds more fun to the game. Just make sure to wash themouth pieces with soapy warm water or add a few drops of Clorox to the water and that’s it. Plus you can always buy more mouth pieces from Amazon for a fair price. This is a hit in every family get together. When we arrive to the party nobody says hi anymore, instead they ask for the game...lol!
customer_reviews.author: Jenitzy P.

customer_reviews.title: Laughed so hard I cried.
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic! Even won over my friend who only likes to play strategic board games. We were all laughing so hard, tears were pouring down our faces by the end of it all; also a little drool... The only setback for me is that you only get 10 mouth pieces and they are too large for my mouth. So if you are someone with a smaller mouth, I would recommend buying additional mouthpieces in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Garshasbi

customer_reviews.title: while the other looked on with disgust LOL.
customer_reviews.text: OMFG! I bought this to play with my sibling which i TOTALLY didn't think would be down to play because they're dudes. Two out of the three that were there were ready to play, while the other looked on with disgust LOL....however once we started playing and he saw how the rest of us were literally crying from all the laughing and drooling, he joined in and HAD.A.BLAST!!!!! i will however buy a bunch of the mouthpieces just because i think it's gross to re-use even if washed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Green Water Witch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed!! I was so excited to play this at a party and there were NO MOUTH PIECES!!!! I want a refund or a brand new order!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Toepfer

customer_reviews.title: Funniest game I’ve ever played!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the funniest games I’ve ever played!!! We laughed so hard tears were streaming done our faces and we could hardly get through each round. The box came neatly packaged and everything was sealed and in order. The mouth pieces are very easy to clean and the cards are double sided for extra playing options. The only suggestion I would ask of the company is a range of different sizes in the box. Some mouths are smaller than others and it can be a bit of a challenge to put the mouth pieces in.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall B.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The size of mouth piece
customer_reviews.text: It’s would be a fun game if the mouth piece would be different sizes. I do not recommend if you have a small mouth! I tried to put in and it was painful and didn’t fit at all!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to drool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game. Be warned - you will drool. Maybe not a game you want to play on your first date or meeting your in laws for the first time. Perfect game to play with close friends and family - or anyone you don't mind drooling and snorting around. Pros: Extra mouthpieces for the germ conscious - aka me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Corydon

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the game came with a couple kid size ...
customer_reviews.text: Do you want tons of laughter in your house? This is your game right here. Non-stop laughs for kids and adults! My only complaint is that all the mouth pieces are older kid/adult size so my toddler is left out when we play, but I just found out you can order kid size ones. It would be nice if the game came with a couple kid size mouth pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Funny cards, may want extra mouth pieces
customer_reviews.text: We really liked reading through some of the cards, but the mouth pieces are all one size, and difficult to use for people with smaller mouths. They are sold else where smaller, but there is no real way to know what size you need. All in all funny game.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Box came damaged!!! But all is well
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the box I was a little concern so I didn't open it to make sure that all the pieces were there and they were so I was happy about that... yes the the box was damaged but all the merchandise we're fine so not a big deal... planning a game night so should be fun...🤗
customer_reviews.author: Bianca B.C

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to have a blast!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it feels so weird to put these things in your mouth this game was a hoot!! There was a little bit of drooling, so we ended up having a towel on hand just in case. But the game itself is really fun. And you can't help but laugh the whole time you are playing. I played with my 7 and 9 year old nephews and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product, the shipping box looked fine and so did the actual box but once I took a look inside, there were no mouth pieces and no game instructions. Just messy cards and the timer. Extremely bummed out about it. Was hoping to play the game with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play with family and friends
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play with family and friends. Hilarious especially when people start to drool and don't notice it. Some of the people that we played with start to get accents when playing. Super fun! If only it could work for younger kids to play.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Ashley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It advertised having 10 mouth guards, but came with only 3. Looked used, I thought I was buying it new. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Mouth pieces are to big
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice concept however the mouth pieces are way too big and extremely painful. I bought it so we could play games during quarantine but nobody in my house is able to play. But the game came nicely intact and in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Peacefrogs

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: We have family game night once a week. This game is fun for all ages. We also bought the additional mouth pieces to go with it. This game will give you hours of fun and make you realize just how hard it is to pronounce words with your mouth stuck open. Since we bought the additional pieces our 8 year old can play too.
customer_reviews.author: mysterybacon

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids for Christmas so we could all play. Be careful. I got chastised about my ignorance and not looking at it closely enough. This is the adult version. The kids already had the kids version so there's a separate one for kids. They were not allowed to open the box.
customer_reviews.author: seywhut

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful game, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious game. This is my go to. Very family friendly. I have three younger cousins who are boys and they got a huge kick out of this. Definitely worth the money! I play with friends my age (mid twenties), teens, and my parents. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but mouthpieces uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun game and I like that a lot of mouthpieces are provided. However the mouth pieces are hard and not very pliable, making them uncomfortable. I don’t think children would have an easy time fitting them in their mouths.
customer_reviews.author: catharine carroll

customer_reviews.title: Older children and adults love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the funniest game. Older children and adults love it!! It is hilarious!! Great for families!! Received great service!! Would definitely shop here again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Have not had a bad experience with this game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. After reading the negative reviews I almost did not purchase it. However, it has been great. This is the only version of the game, that I saw, that comes with both sized mouthpieces so it's ideal for family fun. The only downside is that the mouth pieces are pretty fragile so if you bend them much to take them in and out, they break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Game Choice!
customer_reviews.text: This game is absolutely hilarious! I can’t believe how much I laugh during this game. Just seeing others with the mouth piece in is pretty great. Then, once you start talking it is so funny how words sound coming out of your mouth. I would definitely recommend others to try this game. Try not to pee yourself from laughing too hard!! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny S.

customer_reviews.title: This seemed like a legit product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any typos or anything odd about the game as I read some of the reviews before purchasing. This seemed like a legit product. I played with my girlfriends over the weekend and spent HOURS laughing. The mouth pieces could be slightly smaller, but once you get used to it, it's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funniest Game You'll Play
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! I have played it at two gatherings so far and died laughing both times. It's a fun game for all ages. You won't be disappointed. Warning: keep tissues nearby! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Claudie Izai

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously funny! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Funniest game ever! My friend had it and I had to get my own. Guaranteed to make you laugh! Have a drool rag ready for those who produce a lot of saliva! Lol love that it comes with ten mouth pieces!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Super as I gave it as a gift to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Super as I gave it as a gift to my dentist!! I have been with for 25 years. Told him it was time for him to know how it feels to have to keep your mouth open and talk!!@ He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R

customer_reviews.title: Looks like fun
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only gave it 1 star was because it had no instructions with it so we don't know how to use it. Please send instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Mouth pieces too big for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun to play, but the mouth pieces that are included are definitely for adult mouths only. They are far too large for my 10 year olds mouth. His friend who is 9 tried them as well and they were too large for him too.
customer_reviews.author: Shop4deals

customer_reviews.title: Funny but gross
customer_reviews.text: This is a funny game to play with family. However, the mouth pieces are very uncomfortable and there's a lot of drooling..... Very funny to watch a family member drool and try to talk, but disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F Belloso

customer_reviews.title: These were hit gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I did not discover the age bracket on these until after I had them sent to children who are too young but the kids adapted & had a great time on family game nights (adult supervision).
customer_reviews.author: L. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a Christmas gift and the recipient loved it! We ended up playing it that night
customer_reviews.text: This brought the 10 mouth pieces as promised. I bought this as a Christmas gift and the recipient loved it! We ended up playing it that night. This game is hilarious I guarantee you will not stop laughing. I was laughing so hard I ad tears streaming down my face! You will not regret buying this game!
customer_reviews.author: Randoll Abreu

customer_reviews.title: We are excited to play this one tonight, but ...
customer_reviews.text: We are excited to play this one tonight, but the box came damaged. Not a huge deal, but it does bother me a little that I paid as much and it's damaged. Pieces inside (plastic pieces for your mouth) seem okay, so I won't go to the trouble to return it. May buy from the store next time though.
customer_reviews.author: brian robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun but a bit gross
customer_reviews.text: Fun party game, but I find it a bit gross, there were bill spit and saliva when this game is played. You will see people's teeth filling and caviities, make sure you have tissues when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawgs Fam

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun..
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game- but once you get through a couple of rounds there isn’t much to it. Not super replayable for adults but i bet kiddos love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy S

customer_reviews.title: ... for game night and we had a lot of fun. Everyone was asking about it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for game night and we had a lot of fun. Everyone was asking about it. Definitely must have one.
customer_reviews.author: Nikesh

customer_reviews.title: This game is hilarious! Needed to order more mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious! Needed to order more mouth pieces because only large size came with game & kept popping out of women’s mouth (they came in small, medium & large sizes-when ordered separately)
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay if you like to feel your mouth stretched out for a period ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay if you like to feel your mouth stretched out for a period of time. The words have a lot of Ps, Vs, and Bs so you can pretty much guess what the person is saying. Having to clean the mouthpieces and drying them out or buying new ones is not always convenient but necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarplayer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift and was exactly what was described. They played it a couple of times and haven't heard anything else after that day. It looked kinda sloppy to me.
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Literally one of the funniest games to play! Bought it for my 12 year old niece for Christmas and that night the entire family was gathered around playing it. Ages 10-65 all doing the same activity. Made memories that’ll last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Giant mouth pieces, not great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: They need to clarify that these are giant adult mouth pieces and not suitable for average mouth sizes. Couldn’t play because none of the pieces fit our mouths, except for my husband and his trap is huge ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I would like this game but omg when the whole family played it I could not stop laughing.. yes it makes you look funny but if you want to have fun and a good laugh this is the game for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Speak Out Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a riot! It's so funny and fun to play. However, I can't get my friends to play it more than once, because they feel stupid with the mouthpiece in! Fun Game.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: TWO REASONS TO OWN
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun game causing lots of laughter! Also, I use the mouthpieces for my facial exercises. A double benefit to this game!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jacpbs

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious game
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious game made by a YouTuber named Joe Santagato and Hasbro brought it to life. 10/10 game. He even has his own game edition now (), if you want an 'adult version' of this game.
customer_reviews.author: ReallyAdriel

customer_reviews.title: Really fun but mouth pieces are big.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game. The mout pieces are big. Fine for adults but i would order some small ones for the kids also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nieces loved it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this, but decided to give it a go ! This was a gift to my 14yr old niece, she quickly opened up and had her 16yr sister playing with her. They were laughing and debating and laughing some more, so overall win!
customer_reviews.author: jazzyc

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun as a family playing this! We found the mouth pieces fit well, both adults and children. There are some word that are easier to understand then others but that's just the name of the game
customer_reviews.author: Cardholders

customer_reviews.title: Very funny game
customer_reviews.text: We had more laughs at thanksgiving and the children were able to participate instead of sitting and listening to boring adult talk
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Too much laughter!
customer_reviews.text: So dang much fun! Bought 6 in total. My family and friends have been having a blast. Toss into warm soapy water after each use. Play again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Mima1213

customer_reviews.title: Very funny to play but slightly gross to see everyone drooling around the table
customer_reviews.text: Very funny to play but slightly gross to see everyone drooling around the table. And then there's the fact that you have to wash them after. It's fun though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Best Game Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't stop laughing. On;y for adults, however because the mouth device is too big for children.
customer_reviews.author: Piano 88

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Huge hole on top of box. Had to return since it was supposed to be a gift
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: It isn't always so easy to insert but once you do, game's on! We couldn't stop laughing". The 10 pieces you receive are reusable after cleaning (I used a vinegar wash)
customer_reviews.author: Betty C.

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious, many laughs!!
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious game!! This will be a classic family game that we will play for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Vest

customer_reviews.title: Spreads the Flu
customer_reviews.text: We did not enjoy the game the one and only one time we played it. There is no way that I would ever place the mouth piece back in my mouth after someone else spit all over it. NOT FUN. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H

customer_reviews.title: we had fun
customer_reviews.text: cards have weird sayings lol and there could have been more of them other then that very fun games
customer_reviews.author: Kingamazon

customer_reviews.title: Freaking hillarious.
customer_reviews.text: So funny, does hurt small mouths, and you will drool and everyone will see your dental work, or lack thereof.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping,fun and exactly as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, tons of laughs for all ages, shipping was fast. Product was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Funniest Adult Game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is hysterically funny! One of the best adult games I've played. Recommend it and would buy it again. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: ItaliaMyVine

customer_reviews.title: Funny Game.
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious. It says it comes with 10 pieces and it comes with 10 pieces! Don’t listen to those other reviews. We played this with our friends and it was hilarious. The only thing I wish it had in it was small mouth pieces and big ones. But you can buy the small ones separately! Funny game!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters 1st sleepover. The girls never got around to playing but my family and I have a lot of fun with it! I laugh till I’m crying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So funny!
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun with this game. You start laughing and can't stop. There's not a lot to it but it is a lot of fun and it is very funny. Sometimes you choke on your own spit which adds to the laughter. It's not fun when it happens to you. Overall, we really did enjoy this for mindless fun.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT wash with soap.
customer_reviews.text: Funny game however, if you wash the plastic mouth pieces with soap, they become super brittle and break. A different kind of plastic is needed to make these for long time use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: It was really funny, and lots of fun. We kept hot water on the stove, to disinfect the mouth pieces to re use.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Engel

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I saw Speak Out on Ellen and decided to buy the game on a whim. I'm so glad I did! My family had some much fun. We were crying laughing! The cards have phrases that are hilarious and so hard to say with the dental retractors. Some of the most fun we've had in a while thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jeter

customer_reviews.title: One size mouth pieces don't fit all
customer_reviews.text: Mouth pieces are too large for many (adults and kids) bought different sizes from another source to make it work. Fun game otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: TrisT

customer_reviews.title: My family and myself loved it. At first you feel kind of self ...
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious game to play. My family and myself loved it. At first you feel kind of self conscious putting your mouth/teeth on display but it's all in good fun. We ended up laugh crying we were all having just such a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P

customer_reviews.title: fun concept
customer_reviews.text: This game caused laughs and we had a great time but reuse value is low unless it is the same group each time. Still worth the deal price
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Epic Laughter (Buy additional mouthpieces in Small&Medium)
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game! Had us rolling in tears from laughter. Be sure to buy small&medium mouth pieces as it only comes with large (unless you get the kids vs. parents version) it's worth the $8-$10 for extra mouth pieces so everyone can play no matter what their mouth size is. It's not an age factor, there are kids that use large and adults that use small.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Funny
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind drooling a lot, this is a hilarious game! We loved it. Just make sure you have a towel within reach!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to laugh so hard you cry.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a family gathering. We used after Thanksgiving dinner and after Christmas dinner and it just had us all in stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play with the family. My duaghter’s friends like to play with it when they sleep over. Be prepared for endless laughing with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol R.

customer_reviews.title: Smile!!
customer_reviews.text: Allows everyone to have their own mouth piece. Fits like the original mouth pieces found in the game
customer_reviews.author: Acousticheavn

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy unless you have a mouth the size of a bird.
customer_reviews.text: These plastic applicators will damage your mouth and teeth. Should have used a softer material.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this game being played on a talk show and had to try it for myself. What fun! Looking forward to many hours of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Guintessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the game included some small mouth pieces....if you have a small mouth this would hurt a little...or wont fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Pee in your pants funny!
customer_reviews.text: This game is absolutely hilarious. We could not stop laughing when we played as a family. I have a very sensitive gag reflex and can barely tolerate getting mouth xrays at the dentist and the mouthpiece did not bother me at all. It does not get near the back of your mouth. Great fun. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun playing this, good game for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: Played this with my girlfriends (with some wine consumption being involved) and we laughed SO hard. Hilarious! Can't wait to play again. (I'll remember to put on a bib next time! 😁)
customer_reviews.author: Julia Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun Fun Fun. At first no one wants to play it because they don't like putting the mouth piece in, BUT once they do, they laugh and love it. A few even had to run to the bathroom, if you get my drift. Great game./
customer_reviews.author: lorraine natale

customer_reviews.title: One and done fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute game but once you play it once, it loses it’s fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica U

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Game
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time playing this game with friends and family of all ages, 12-53 years old. It's fun and silly all the same time. Upon completion of the game, we put the mouth pieces into the dishwasher for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun and lots of drool! . This is a family favorite for everyone, both young and old to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but daughter wanted to invoke takesie backsies with Santa
customer_reviews.text: My four year old told me that we should send this back to Santa because it scared her. I told her Santa had a no takesies backsides rule. I, for one, had fun using it at a bachelorette party.
customer_reviews.author: Tdpoole

customer_reviews.title: Add it to your board game collection!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this game because we look like absolute idiots lol makes for good family time or drunken adult laughs hahahah
customer_reviews.author: ShayR

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so awesome!!! I purchased it to play at my family's annual Christmas Eve celebration!!! It was a blast!!! It's great for all ages!!! I am definitely going to purchase the expansion packs for it!!! Really happy I bought it...the family and I had a great time!!! The only thing that I wish was that there were refill mouth pieces available. I just ended up sterilizing them in boiling water and soap.
customer_reviews.author: A. Braxton-Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious. I can hardly get to the phrase cards when I play with friends because we are laughing so hard looking at each other with the mouth pieces. A must-have for any household that loves to laugh and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Patricia

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter wanted this
customer_reviews.text: It was missing pieces mailed it back for a refund. Found cheaper in the store
customer_reviews.author: caral0907

product_meta.title: Speak Out Game (with 10 Mouthpieces)
product_meta.description: Get ready to be doubled over with laughter with this ridiculous mouthpiece challenge game! The Speak Out game brings friends and family together for laugh-out-loud fun as players try to say different phrases while wearing a mouthpiece that won't let them shut their mouth. In the Speak Out game, players draw from the deck and read the phrase as best as they can, but it's not so easy to do when the mouthpiece is hindering them from forming words correctly. The timer counts down as players try to say phrases such as "he's my stealthy pet ferret name Garrett", "slow down, you careless clown", or "pelicans love pollywog falafels." The laughter continues as players try to decipher what in the world their teammate is trying to say, and must correctly guess the phrase in order to earn the card. The team with the most cards at the end of the game wins. The Speak Out game includes 200 double-sided cards, 10 mouthpieces, and a timer. Hasbro gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Hilarious fun for family and friends
Includes 200 double-sided cards for lots of phrases
Includes 10 mouthpieces, 200 double-sided cards, timer, and instructions
